SYSTEM: PresntacionMLF-vFinal.pdf: Página 4
Initial and Future Work with the Easy-to-Read Methodology 
Context 
 
SlideWiki is a crowdsourcing platform where authors 
can collaborate, reuse, adapt and share slide content 
for educational purposes 
The 
SlideWiki 
platform 
decomposes 
learning 
materials into fine-grained artifacts (slides and decks) 
Slides and decks are organized into tree structures 
Slides and decks are internally represented using HTML
